nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 9 is the ninth issue of the comic book series Star Wars Adventures. The issue contains two stories, "Trouble Again" by John Barber, and "Tales from Wild Space: IG-88 vs. the Gatto Gang" by Nick Brokenshire. The comic book was released on April 18, 2018 by IDW Publishing.
Droids take center stage in both stories of this comical and exciting adventure! C-3PO might be in over his head as he takes on a new job, and IG-88 is determined to capture his crafty bounty!
